sentences.en: a group campaigning against the destruction of the rain forests
sentences.cn: 发起运动反对破坏热带雨林的团体

sentences.en: British Asians have begun a campaign calling for an end to discrimination.
sentences.cn: 亚裔英国人发起了一项呼吁消除种族歧视的运动。

sentences.en: Candidates deemed vote-worthy will be rewarded with campaign funds.
sentences.cn: 被认为有望获胜的候选人将会获得竞选资金。

sentences.en: Four candidates are slugging it out in a dirty campaign.
sentences.cn: 4名候选人将在一场肮脏的竞选中一决高下。

sentences.en: Friends spoke of "a virulent personal campaign" being waged against him.
sentences.cn: 朋友们说针对他正在发起“一场恶毒的个人攻击”。

sentences.en: Governor Caperton has the largest campaign war chest.
sentences.cn: 卡珀顿州长筹得的竞选资金数额最大。

sentences.en: He claimed he was the victim of a dirty tricks campaign..
sentences.cn: 他声称他是一场卑鄙的竞选运动的牺牲品。

sentences.en: His re-election campaign is floundering.
sentences.cn: 他寻求连任的竞选运动陷入了僵局。

sentences.en: Jones ran a good campaign.
sentences.cn: 琼斯的活动搞得很成功。

sentences.en: Mr Baker would take command of the campaign.
sentences.cn: 贝克先生会负责这次运动。

sentences.en: Mr Mendes was leading a campaign to save Brazil's rainforest from exploitation.
sentences.cn: 门德斯先生正领导一场运动，以拯救遭到乱砍滥伐的巴西热带雨林。

sentences.en: Perot hoped to run another series of campaign infomercials.
sentences.cn: 佩罗期待着新一轮的竞选宣传节目的播出。

sentences.en: Police have launched a campaign to crack down on drug dealers.
sentences.cn: 警方发起了一场严厉打击毒贩的运动。

sentences.en: The allies are intensifying their air campaign.
sentences.cn: 盟军在加强他们的空中军事活动。

sentences.en: The campaign was gimmicky, but it had a serious side to it.
sentences.cn: 这次运动虽然大搞噱头，但也有其严肃的一面。

sentences.en: The campaign would be short and relatively bloodless.
sentences.cn: 这场战役应该是速战速决，基本没什么伤亡。

sentences.en: The Front adopted an aggressive propaganda campaign against its rivals.
sentences.cn: 该阵线采用激进的宣传手段对付它的对手。

sentences.en: The media has waged a virulent hate campaign against her.
sentences.cn: 新闻界向她发起了恶毒攻击。

sentences.en: They invested time and energy in the election campaign.
sentences.cn: 他们把时间和精力投入选举活动。

sentences.en: We are campaigning for law reform.
sentences.cn: 我们正从事法律改革运动。

sentences.en: We have started a campaign for better nursery and school services.
sentences.cn: 我们已发起一场要求改善幼儿园和中小学教育服务的运动。

sentences.en: We should take action to support the campaign.
sentences.cn: 我们应该采取行动来支持这个活动。
